sense.def:
To overhaul a piece of equipment
pomeni očistiti in preveriti delovanje naprave ter jo po potrebi popraviti.

seg.quote: The engines were overhauled before our departure.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
overhauls a system or method
, natančno pregleda sistem ali postopek in ga spremeni, da bi ga izboljšal.

seg.quote: The company needs to overhaul its techniques and methods.
...a major overhaul of the country's educational system.
